text: It's human nature to start taking things for granted again when danger isn't banging loudly on the door.
author: David Hackworth

text: I used to be such a militant city-ist, but more and more I've seen forests and nature and oceans, and I don't know any more if this is the awesomest way to live.
author: Regina Spektor

text: There's a constantly applicable nature to soul music, whereas sometimes pop music can be a periodical.
author: John Mayer

text: Games, by nature, have more plot options and non-linear qualities than TV and film.
author: David Duchovny

text: I mean, you always want everybody to pat you on the back and tell you you're wonderful every time you do something I think that's human nature.
author: David Duchovny
